product_name: White Sierra Island Shorts - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Great for adventure travel that involves hiking, biking or paddling, the women's White Sierra Island Shorts are made of soft, pre-faded and quick-drying nylon. 100% woven nylon faille stands up to the rigors of outdoor adventure and offers protection from harmful UV rays. Side cargo pocket keeps gear handy. Hand pockets; 2 back pockets with secure rip-and-stick closure. Comfort-fit elastic at back of waist; inner drawcord. White Sierra Island Shorts for women have button-tabs that let you adjust the leg openings. Special buy.
